nodes.text: An Appraiser's Eye was a type of cybernetic used by smugglers or other individuals who wished to appraise an item's approximate value.

A combination scanner and cross-reference tool, an Appraiser's eye was implanted via cybernetic eye or lens implant, and was capable of identifying most goods and items quickly and accurately. Additionally, an Appraiser's eye constantly records commodity prices on planets visited, as well as offers current market trends on items in question, allowing for extremely accurate appraisal of any given items worth.
